title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                 Curriculum Materials       The Santa Monica Mountains offers free curriculum-based programs and materials. Ranger-led programs are offered to students in Los Angeles and Ventura Counties. Programs are held from November through June. For schools in our service area, free transportation may be available. The National Park Legacy program and other curriculum materials are available to schools by request.   To request materials for the National Park Legacy program please download and submit the application below.
